author: Goviet nam-2015-10-09T07:24:15-0400
title: Visit Thuan An near Saigon
text:
Travel Articles | October 9, 2015 
The Hoang yen Hotel- Restaurant- Bar- Karaoke- Massage worthy for a 3 star hotel, located in Binh Duong Avenue, the main way connecting Sai Gon – Binh Duong is a reliable address for expectant i... 
The Hoang yen Hotel- Restaurant- Bar- Karaoke- Massage worthy for a 3 star hotel, located in Binh Duong Avenue, the main way connecting Sai Gon – Binh Duong is a reliable address for expectant investors. Hoang yen is one of the most sophisticated, luxurious and modern in Binh Duong at the moment. Built in 2007, Hoang Yen Hotel Thuan An is a distinct addition to Binh Duong and a smart choice for travelers. Situated only 25 km from the city center, guests are well located to enjoy the town's attractions and activities. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations. Hoang Yen Hotel Thuan An offers impeccable service and all the essential amenities to invigorate travelers. The hotel provides free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service to ensure our guests the greatest comfort. Hoang Yen Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Binh Duong area. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. All the necessary facilities, including restaurant, salon, shops, meeting facilities, tours, are at hand. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, jacuzzi, massage, sauna. Discover all Binh Duong has to offer by making Hoang Yen Hotel your base. Hotel information is in updating process, please contact us to update hotel information with free of charge. Some 1. 2 star hotels' facilities in provinces and cities now are not synchronized so the information and pictures of the hotel and incomplete information. Therefore, please contact hotels, directly at the detail that we offer or contact us. 
If what you're looking for is a conveniently located hotel in Binh Duong, look no further than An Loc Hotel. From here, guests can enjoy easy access to all that the lively city has to offer. With its convenient location, the hotel offers easy access to the city's must-see destinations. An Loc Hotel also offers many facilities to enrich your stay in Binh Duong. Top features of An Loc Hotel include disabled facilities, elevator, business center, tours, laundry service/dry cleaning. Source: Free Articles from ArticlesFactory.com ABOUT THE AUTHOR
